name: Community Idea Introduction
author: moxious
summary: This video introduces the idea of this repository, and what it is for

name: Geeks, Mops, and Sociopaths in Subculture Evolution: Overview & Discussion
author: moxious
summary: David Chapman (Meaningness) published an article on the evolution of subcultures and different personas that develop when this happens. This video summarizes and analyzes that with an eye towards broader community issues. The original blog can be found at https://meaningness.com/geeks-mops-sociopaths
